Internal Tools

The Universe

Research and analysis tools for investment decisions.

Investment Opus

BTC sine model, portfolio tracking, exit strategy, and projection tables.

BTC Sine Model

Cycle timing model with log regression baseline and sine-wave deviation.

Macro Dashboard

Multi-indicator cycle assessment using FRED data and GMI/Bittel framework.

Valuation Calculator

Calculate ownership, dilution, and returns across funding rounds.

Internal use only. Not for distribution.
